```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
mortality_factors <- read.csv("mortality_factors.csv")
mortality_race <- read.csv("mortality_race.CSV")
```

```{r}
mortality_factors <- mortality_factors %>%
  rename(state = Site.Name)
mortality_factors <- mortality_factors %>%
  rename(year = Year)

mortality_race <- mortality_race %>%
  rename(state = location_name)
mortality_race <- mortality_race %>%
  rename(year = year_id)
```



```{r}
mortality_total <- left_join(mortality_factors, mortality_race, by = c("state", "year"))
```
